entries.name: OpenSSL::OCSP::CertificateId.new(subject, issuer, digest = nil) → certificate_idclick to toggle source
cmp(other) → true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Compares this certificate id with other and returns true if they are the same.

entries.name: cmp_issuer(other) → true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Compares this certificate id's issuer with other and returns true if they are the same.

entries.name: hash_algorithm → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the ln (long name) of the hash algorithm used to generate the issuerNameHash and the issuerKeyHash values.

entries.name: issuer_key_hash → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the issuerKeyHash of this certificate ID, the hash of the issuer's public key.

entries.name: issuer_name_hash → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the issuerNameHash of this certificate ID, the hash of the issuer's distinguished name calculated with the hashAlgorithm.

entries.name: serial → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the serial number of the certificate for which status is being requested.

entries.name: to_der → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Encodes this certificate identifier into a DER-encoded string.
